QuestData.Title: Terrible Little Creatures
QuestData.Description: Gnolls! These terrible little creatures are a blight upon any land - which is saying a lot when you consider that Hillsbrad is Forsaken territory. Kill as many of the gnolls at the Nethander Stead as you can. For the good of the world!
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill any 10 Gnolls at the Nethander Stead.
QuestData.RewardText: Though you have taken a sizeable chunk out of the current gnoll populace of Hillsbrad, more will take their place. For now you may sit comfortably knowing that you did your part.
